state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Ausa
    participant Patient
    participant Device
    participant AuthenticationService
    participant AzureDPS
    participant Ausa Cloud Database

    Ausa->>Patient: Send Device to Patient
    Patient->>Device: Starts device
    Device->>Patient: Displays Ausa logo and registration prompt
    Device->>Patient: Prompts for patient details
    Device->>AuthenticationService: Attempts to register device via Azure DPS
    AuthenticationService->>AzureDPS: Sends credentials for validation
    AzureDPS->>AuthenticationService: Allocates IoT Hub and returns credentials
    AuthenticationService->>Device: Sends back credentials
    Device->>Ausa Cloud Database: Registers deviceId to track patient-device mapping

sequenceDiagram
    participant Patient
    participant Device
    participant AuthenticationService
    participant AzureDPS
    participant Ausa Cloud Database

    Patient->>Device: Receives device from AUSA
    Patient->>Device: Starts device
    Device->>Patient: Displays Ausa logo and registration prompt
    Device->>Patient: Prompts for patient details
    Device->>AuthenticationService: Attempts to register device via Azure DPS
    AuthenticationService->>AzureDPS: Sends credentials for validation
    AzureDPS->>AuthenticationService: Allocates IoT Hub and returns credentials
    AuthenticationService->>Device: Sends back credentials
    Device->>Ausa Cloud Database: Registers deviceId to track patient-device mapping
